messages.subject: Re: horde of unschoolers- guild on world of warcraft
messages.msgSnippet: ... soooo tired today because I needed to get up early for work. It was worth it to see the joy on their faces when the cashier handed it all over. I know
messages.messageBody:
"Ren Allen" <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
> We stood in line at midnight to pick up our expansion packs....I'm
soooo tired today because I needed to get up early for work. It was
worth it to see the joy on their faces when the cashier handed it all
over. I know what's going on at MY house today!:)>

I had pre-ordered the expansion pack last May from Amazon, but we just
got back from Best Buy and picked it up there (they had plenty in
stock, so I guess the demand varies in different areas?). The order
from Amazon is being prepared for shipping, so I can't cancel it and
will have to return it, but I didn't want to take the chance that we
couldn't get our hands on one today.

It's being installed as I'm writing this!
Jann

messages.subject: Re: horde of unschoolers- guild on world of warcraft
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi, I m Markus (13 yrs) and I would like to join the guild. I should have BC this week. Is there a link to a guild website for more info on the guild? Are
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "patrick morris"
<katinandrea@...> wrote:
>
> hi all
> there are currently 35 members but this is soon to explode as many
> have waited till the burning crusades expansion appears to create a new
> character, come join the horde of unschoolers it is on the realm
> called
> the venture co
> it is a horde guild
> come join the fun
> patrick
>
Hi,

I'm Markus (13 yrs) and I would like to join the guild. I should have
BC this week. Is there a link to a guild website for more info on the
guild? Are we all going to be Blood Elves or can we choose any horde race?

Looking forward to playing with all of you!

Markus

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: horde of unschoolers- guild on world of warcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Sounds like our house Ren.  We got in line at 12:00 didn t get  our game and stratedgy guide till 1 AM got home and realized that WONDERFUL  Vista wont allow
messages.messageBody:
Sounds like our house Ren. We got in line at 12:00 didn't get our game and
stratedgy guide till 1 AM got home and realized that WONDERFUL Vista wont
allow me to install BC onto my computer because of how it writes to the hard
drive and Vista isnt having or liking it. So i had to uninstall Vista
reintstall XP (which took 3 hours since Vista damaged the partitions in my computer
that are supposed to be protected) then had to reinstall everything. Anyone
who is thinking of getting Vista DONT. You'll want to throw your computer out
the window.

In a message dated 1/16/2007 7:18:56 A.M. Central Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

We stood in line at midnight to pick up our expansion packs....I'm
soooo tired today because I needed to get up early for work. It was
worth it to see the joy on their faces when the cashier handed it all
over. I know what's going on at MY house today!:)




~Alyssa in IL
_http://squishymommy.blogspot.com_ (http://squishymommy.blogspot.com/)


" Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

"All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good people do
nothing."

" Knowledge is power but how you use that power defines wether you are good
or evil."






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: horde of unschoolers- guild on world of warcraft
messages.msgSnippet: ~~here are currently 35 members but this is soon to explode as many have waited till the burning crusades expansion appears to create a new character, come
messages.messageBody:
~~here are currently 35 members but this is soon to explode as many
have waited till the burning crusades expansion appears to create a new
character, come join the horde of unschoolers it is on the realm
called the venture co~~


Sierra joined but has been playing more on Dragonblight with her
cousin than on Venture Co. It's so nice that you all created this,
what a fun place for unschoolers to hang out!:) Sierra said they were
all dancing one night and it was sorta like "being at the conference".

We stood in line at midnight to pick up our expansion packs....I'm
soooo tired today because I needed to get up early for work. It was
worth it to see the joy on their faces when the cashier handed it all
over. I know what's going on at MY house today!:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
